name: buldy
description: Modern CSS framework distilled from the best of larger frameworks

scripts.build:core: sass --no-source-map scss/buldy.scss dist/buldy.css && sass --style=compressed --no-source-map scss/buldy.scss dist/buldy.min.css
scripts.build:raster: sass --no-source-map scss/layout/raster.scss dist/raster.css && sass --style=compressed --no-source-map scss/layout/raster.scss dist/raster.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:raster
